assetsEmptyDescription: Add some assets you care about to watch them here.
addUserDialogDescription: Search for a Bitshares account to add to your favourites.
usersEmptyDescription: Track accounts you care about by adding them here.
addPairDialogDescription: Choose a base and quote asset to save a market pair (e.g. BTS_CNY).
pairsEmptyDescription: Create a pair like BTS_CNY and it will appear here for quick access.
